scenes.title: Lanterns Over Neo‑Gotham
scenes.maya_text: The gentle rain kisses the neon lights, <sigh> creating a shimmering dance across the streets. <whisper> Up here, on my spire, I can listen to the distant hum of drones, like whispers of the city below. <curious> There's a certain peace in the chaos of Neo-Gotham.
scenes.voice_description: Warm conversational female, mid-30s, soothing tone

scenes.title: A Visitor for the Bat
scenes.maya_text: A delivery bot arrives, soft whirring sounds punctuating the air. <sigh> It presents a hand-knitted scarf, small but filled with warmth. A note attached reads, 'Someone cares.' <giggle> It's a gentle reminder amidst the city's steel heartbeat.

scenes.title: Circuit Alley
scenes.maya_text: Hey there! Looks like you've got quite the project on your hands. <chuckle> Let me give you a hand with that circuit. <excited> This lamp will light up the whole alley! <sigh> Just a quick swap, and voilà! <laugh> You're back in business.
scenes.voice_description: Warm conversational female, mid-30s, friendly tone

scenes.title: The Quiet Workshop
scenes.maya_text: Here I am, back in my little sanctuary. <sigh> Just me and my loyal robotic companion. <giggle> Patching up this cracked HUD feels oddly satisfying. <chuckle> The tools clink gently, creating a rhythm of comfort in the silence.
scenes.voice_description: Warm conversational female, mid-30s, soothing tone

scenes.title: Dawn on the Spire
scenes.maya_text: The sun rises, painting the city in golden hues. <sigh> Batman pulls the scarf tight around his cloak, feeling a sense of calm wash over him. Another peaceful morning in Gotham, where hope flickers like the dawn light.
